survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for High-Speed Internet Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their satisfaction with high-speed internet services, including reliability, speed, customer support, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of your high-speed internet service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of your high-speed internet service?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience interruptions in your internet service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale to gauge interruption frequency.

script.question_text: How often do you experience interruptions in your internet service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following issues have you encountered with your internet service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow for multiple selections to identify common issues.

script.question_text: Which of the following issues have you encountered with your internet service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the speed of your internet service for your daily needs?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to assess perceived speed adequacy.

script.question_text: How would you rate the speed of your internet service for your daily needs?

questions.question_text: Have you contacted customer support for your internet service in the past 6 months?
questions.client_notes: Binary response to filter follow-up questions.

script.question_text: Have you contacted customer support for your internet service in the past 6 months?

questions.question_text: If you contacted customer support, how satisfied were you with the resolution provided?
questions.client_notes: Include an N/A option for respondents who did not contact support.

script.question_text: If you contacted customer support, how satisfied were you with the resolution provided?

questions.question_text: What is your overall satisfaction with your high-speed internet service provider?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure overall satisfaction.

script.question_text: What is your overall satisfaction with your high-speed internet service provider?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your internet service provider to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to assess likelihood of recommendation.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your internet service provider to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your internet service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your internet service?
